name: Fry chili chicken Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Fry chili chicken Recipe: Chicken 1 kg 16 pieces Chili sauce 2 tbsp Soya sauce 2 tbsp Vinegar 2 tbsp Crushed red pepper 1 tsp Salt 1 tsp Ginger garlic paste 1 tbsp Tomato paste 1 tbsp Suree sweet chili sauce 2 tbsp Flour 3 tbsp Corn flour 4 tbsp Egg 1
instructions: Marinate chicken with all the ingredients for 2 hours, deep fry till light golden and crisp.
